attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The DVLA say that cloned cars are nothing to do with them; the victims should bare the cost.
OK let’s look at what happened; the DVLA had some logbooks printed in which they found an error, so they chucked them in the bin!  Some naughty crooks found the log books and have been using them ever since to clone cars, the DVLA say it is nothing to do with them and nothing can/could be done.  They have posted the serial numbers affected on the internet...  
The most obvious thing to do is immediately change the design of the document, issue replacements for all vehicles already registered, problem solved...  
This raises the question, is the DVLA an incompetent organisation unfit for purpose?  In the light of many other failings of this organisation, should it be disbanded and reformed with a mandate to serve the people, fairly, honestly, and efficiently.
